mapper.update: /* 관리자 문의 타입 수정 */ UPDATE inquiry_type SET iqt_nm = #{inquiryTypeName}, iqt_expln = #{inquiryTypeExpln}, stc_cd = #{statusCode}, iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd = #{inquiryTypeMdfcnAdm}, iqt_mdfcn_ymdt = NOW() WHERE iqt_cd = #{inquiryTypeCode}
mapper.select: /* 관리자 문의 타입_원본 조회 */ SELECT it.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, it.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, it.iqt_expln as iqt_expln, it.stc_cd as stc_cd, sc.stc_nm as stc_nm, it.iqt_reg_adm_cd as iqt_reg_adm_cd, it.iqt_reg_ymdt as iqt_reg_ymdt, it.iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd as iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd, it.iqt_mdfcn_ymdt as iqt_mdfcn_ymdt FROM inquiry_type it LEFT JOIN status_code sc ON it.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd WHERE iqt_cd = #{code}
mapper.update: /* 관리자 문의 답변 업데이트 */ UPDATE inquiry_process SET iqp_ans_cn = #{inquiryProcessAnswer}, adm_cd = #{inquiryProcessRegAdmCode}, iqp_reg_ymdt = NOW(), iqp_mdfcn_adm_cd = #{inquiryProcessMdfcnAdmCode}, iqp_mdfcn_ymdt = NOW(), stc_cd = 'SD_PROCESS_END' WHERE iq_cd = #{inquiryCode}
/* 관리자 문의 내역 테이블 수정 */ UPDATE inquiry SET iqt_cd = #{inquiryTypeCode}, iq_mdfcn_adm_cd = #{inquiryMdfcnAdmCode}, iq_mdfcn_ymdt = NOW() WHERE iq_cd = #{inquiryCode}
/* 관리자 문의 프로세스 테이블 수정 */ UPDATE inquiry_process SET stc_cd = #{statusCode}, iqp_mdfcn_adm_cd = #{inquiryMdfcnAdmCode}, iqp_mdfcn_ymdt = NOW() WHERE iq_cd = #{inquiryCode}
mapper.select: /* 관리자 문의 상세 수정 */ select i.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, m.mbr_nm as mbr_nm, i.iq_reg_ymdt as iq_reg_ymdt, IFNULL(sc.stc_cd, 'SD_BEFORE') as stc_cd, IFNULL(sc.stc_nm, '확인전') as stc_nm, i.iq_cd as iq_cd, i.iq_ttl as iq_ttl, i.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, iqt.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, i.iq_cn as iq_cn, sa.sa_cd as sa_cd, sa.sa_orgnl_nm as sa_orgnl_nm, sa.sa_srvr_nm as sa_srvr_nm, sa.sa_path as sa_path, sa.sa_size as sa_size, i.iq_mdfcn_adm_cd as iq_mdfcn_adm_cd, i.iq_mdfcn_ymdt as iq_mdfcn_ymdt, ip.iqp_ans_cn as iqp_ans_cn from inquiry i left join submission_attachment sa on i.iq_cd = sa.sa_refer_cd inner join member m on i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd inner join inquiry_type iqt using (iqt_cd) left join inquiry_process ip using (iq_cd) left join status_code sc on ip.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd where i.iq_cd = #{inquiryCode} order by m.mbr_nm desc;

/* 문의 타입 내역 조회 */ select it.iqt_cd as iqt_cd, it.iqt_nm as iqt_nm, it.iqt_expln as iqt_expln, it.stc_cd as stc_cd, sc.stc_nm as stc_nm, it.iqt_reg_adm_cd as iqt_reg_adm_cd, it.iqt_reg_ymdt as iqt_reg_ymdt, it.iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd as iqt_mdfcn_adm_cd, it.iqt_mdfcn_ymdt as iqt_mdfcn_ymdt from inquiry_type it left join status_code sc on it.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd order by it.iqt_reg_ymdt;

/* 문의 리스트 조회 */ SELECT i.iq_cd AS iq_cd, m.mbr_nm AS mbr_nm, i.iqt_cd AS iqt_cd, iqt.iqt_nm AS iqt_nm, i.iq_ttl AS iq_ttl, i.iq_reg_ymdt AS iq_reg_ymdt, ip.iqp_cd AS iqp_cd, COALESCE(ip.stc_cd, 'SD_BEFORE') AS stc_cd, COALESCE(sc.stc_nm, '확인전') AS stc_nm FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN member m ON i.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd LEFT JOIN inquiry_type iqt ON i.iqt_cd = iqt.iqt_cd LEFT JOIN inquiry_process ip ON i.iq_cd = ip.iq_cd LEFT JOIN status_code sc ON ip.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd ORDER BY i.iq_reg_ymdt DESC;
